fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
if ledian is in the game, their next "good" action is Nuh Uh (930)'d (up to hosts)
- if ledian isnt in the game, the person who is closest to the win condition present at the start of the game has a card stolen from them

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:black:1106265022453268530> + <:white:1107514189574045726> ):
fields.value:
if ledian is in the game, their next action is Nuh Uh (930)'d and their next turn is skipped
- if ledian isnt in the game, the person who is closest to the win condition present at the start of the game draws 4 cards and has a card that wasnt a part of those 4 cards to be stolen from them
